import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { User } from 'lucide-react'; const ProfileInput = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { currentUser, updateUserProfile } = useAuth(); const [profile, setProfile] = useState({ name: '', age: '', gender: '', state: '', district: '', education: '', occupation: '', income: '', category: '', maritalStatus: '', disability: 'none' }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setProfile(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); setError(''); try { // Save profile using the new auth system await updateUserProfile(profile); console.log('Profile submitted:', profile); // Navigate to schemes page navigate('/schemes'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error saving profile:', error); setError('Error saving profile. Please try again.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (

Create Your Profile

Tell us about yourself to find the best government schemes and scholarships for you

{error && (
{error}
)}
{/* Basic Information */}

Basic Information

{/* Education & Occupation */}

Education & Occupation

{/* Financial Information */}

Financial Information

{/* Category & Special Status */}

Category & Special Status

); }; export default ProfileInput;
